lines: Always be yourself and have faith in yourself.
Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen.
Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it. It's the hard that makes it great.
A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
Far and away the best prize that life offers is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
Have patience with all things, but, first of all with yourself.
Patience is not simply the ability to wait—it's how we behave while we're waiting.
Patience and tenacity of purpose are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
Great difficulties may be surmounted by patience and perseverance.
Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
Compassion is the greatest form of love humans have to offer.
What do we live for; if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
If you are going to be compassionate, be prepared for action!
Compassion for others begins with kindness to ourselves.
True compassion means not only feeling another's pain but also being moved to help relieve it.
The best teachers are those who show you where to look but don’t tell you what to see.
One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
Education is the way to move mountains, to build bridges, to change the world.
Children must be taught how to think, not what to think.
The purpose of education is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
Grit is the grain of character.
Above everything else I've done, I've always said I've had more guts than I've got talent.
Every great story happened when someone decided not to give up.
What is grit? Grit is refusing to give up. It’s persistence. It’s making your own luck.
We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
Life is an adventure in forgiveness.
Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
Without forgiveness, there is no future.
It’s not an easy journey, to get to a place where you forgive people. But it is such a powerful place, because it frees you.
Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.
I cannot do all the good that the world needs. But the world needs all the good that I can do.
Caring about the happiness of others, we find our own.
